description:
••• Download the #1 Slots App on iPhone/iPad for free today! •••

Play the #1 slot machine game on iphone/ipad/ipod with the real las vegas classic slot machines. The app gives you all the excitement and thrill you would experience in a real casino. This app has the original vegas slot machines!

This app has been created by casino experts to match the real slots experience. You will enjoy the original three reel slots. Get ready to win big!!

The app has engaging graphics, sound and smooth game play. This slots game is the closest you can get to a real Las Vegas slots experience.

► Free coins
► Bonus coins every 2 hour

Enjoy the real and the ORIGINAL slots of Vegas!

Get set, start spinning, win big!!
